flawed_nl_solution:
After paying off the cost of ingredients, Andrew has $400 - $100 = $<<400-100=290>>290
Since half of the money goes to the homeless shelter, the shelter receives $290 / 2 = $<<290/2=145>>145
After contributing some of his own money, Andrew donates $145 + $10 = $<<145+10=155>>155 to the shelter.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 300, not 290. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
